name: Cardinal Wings Aviation
about: Cardinal Wings Aviation, located in Louisville, Kentucky, is a professional flight school offering comprehensive training from Private Pilot to Airline Transport Pilot (ATP) certifications. We utilize a range of aircraft, including the Cessna 172M, Cirrus SR20/SR22, and Piper Seminole, many of which are equipped with advanced digital instrument panels. As the only Cirrus Certified Training Center in the Louisville area, we provide high-quality instruction in single and multi-engine aircraft. Our training programs are self-paced and tailored to accommodate each student's schedule and learning style. We also offer additional endorsements such as Instrument Rating, Multi-Engine Rating, and Biennial Flight Reviews. With a focus on efficiency and safety, Cardinal Wings Aviation is dedicated to helping students achieve their aviation goals. Contact us to start your flying journey today.
